bibliography_entries.line_html: Barlow, Claude W. Epistolae Senecae ad Paulum et Pauli ad Senecam quae vocantur. Papers and Monographs of the American Academy in Rome 10. Horn, Austria: American Academy in Rome, 1938. (Barlow provides the numeration of the epistles. The majority of the MS sigla [A-Z] are assigned and used in the edition by Barlow. Barlow gives helpful information on MSS history and textual families, pp. 8–26).
bibliography_entries.line_text: Barlow, Claude W. Epistolae Senecae ad Paulum et Pauli ad Senecam quae vocantur. Papers and Monographs of the American Academy in Rome 10. Horn, Austria: American Academy in Rome, 1938. (Barlow provides the numeration of the epistles. The majority of the MS sigla [A-Z] are assigned and used in the edition by Barlow. Barlow gives helpful information on MSS history and textual families, pp. 8–26).
